Analyze the following text: A hybrid vehicle control apparatus 40 60 for a hybrid vehicle 10 which includes an internal combustion engine 23 and a motor 21 22 as drive sources of said vehicle includes a storage battery 31 for supplying electric power to said motor and is configured to perform regenerative braking by using said motor and charge said storage battery with electric power generated as a result of said regenerative braking and electric power generated by using output of said internal combustion engine said hybrid vehicle control apparatus comprising a controller which is configured to control said internal combustion engine and said motor in such a manner that said vehicle produces a demanded drive force Tr and said remaining capacity SOC of said storage battery approaches a predetermined target remaining capacity SOC wherein said controller comprises a targetdownhillsection extraction portion which is configured to obtain a planned travel route of said vehicle and extract as a targetdownhillsection a downhill section which is contained in said planned travel route and which has a height difference between a start point and an end point of said downhill section greater in absolute value than a predetermined height difference threshold and a downhill control portion which is operable when said targetdownhillsection is extracted so as to execute downhill control when said vehicle travels in a particular section of a section which extends to the end point of said targetdownhillsection from a downhill control start point which is shifted back from the start point of said targetdownhillsection by a predetermined distance said particular section containing at least a section extending from said downhill control start point to the start point of said targetdownhillsection and said downhill control being adapted to change the target remaining capacity to a remaining capacity smaller as compared with the case where said vehicle travels in sections other than said particular section wherein said targetdownhillsection extraction portion includes aheight difference threshold setting portion which is operable when an estimated average speed of said vehicle during travel in said downhill section is estimated to be a first speed so as to set the height difference threshold to a larger value as compared with the case where said estimated average speed of said vehicle is estimated to be a second speed lower than said first speed.
